bug.author: paveldournov
bug.summary: KF dashboard is not showing the link to Artifacts
bug.description: KF deployed from master, 7/19 The deployment includes the metadata-ui and other metadata services, The metadata UI is accessible over a port forward to the metadata-ui pod However - the KF Dashboard is not showing the link to the Artifacts (metadata) page, and the link /_/metadata is not working.
